title: S74 Silk Summers SGC 3 Turkey Red back
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: S74 Silk Summers SGC 3 Turkey Red back
posts.post_content:
Offered here is a very nice S74 -1 White Silk with a blazing Turkey Red Ad backed. Grade a 3 by SGC due to the factory fold this silks has beautiful Red color printed ink on the front, excellent clarity and registration and just a hint of fraying in the top border. A high grade S74-1 aside from the standard factory fold. It also has the more interesting American League style with bats, balls a glove and the catcher's mask design. 
SOLD et plus 5.00 for shipping with tracking
